title: DPPN: Meeting Tom Cruise- Malin Ackerman + Has Oscar snubbed Cruise?
itunes:title: DPPN: Meeting Tom Cruise- Malin Ackerman + Has Oscar snubbed Cruise?
description:
Somehow we haven’t been cancelled yet, and so this week, Jeff Meacham is thinking about just how yoked TC was in the early days; the trio debates Cruise’s decades-long Oscar snubbing; and we bring you our interview with the great and powerful Malin Akerman, who starred in ROCK OF AGES as the journalist who knows her way around a pool table, Constance Sack. Malin talks child psychology, eyeball licking, mommy brain, and of course, monkeys.

http://podcasts.iheartradio.com/meetingtomcruisepodcast2

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
